headline.main: KNOX TALK TAKEN CALMLY IN TOKYO; His Warning Does Not Arouse Undue Misgivings -- Division of Opinion in U.S. Seen

lead_paragraph: TOKYO, Oct. 25 -- The statement of United States Secretary of the Navy Frank Knox regarding the danger of an American collision with Japan and the shifting of war materiel shipments from Vladivostok to Archangel should this occur has attracted considerable attention here without causing any undue misgivings.
